statements: UPDATE customer_information SET full_name = 'John Doe', email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;

UPDATE customer_information SET full_name='Alice Johnson', phone_number='123-456-7890' WHERE customer_id=1;

UPDATE customers SET customer_name='John Doe', email_address='johndoe@example.com' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE purchase_history SET purchase_amount=5000.00, purchase_date='2022-06-30' WHERE purchase_id=100;
